skills.name: Elemental Sedimentation: Hydro
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C132041]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Lifeform: Hydro</color>.
skills.description: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains Elemental Lifeform: Hydro.

skills.name: Tainted Waters Change Their Shape
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) Will not be <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C106]</color>;\nThis character gains +2 DMG when their HP does not exceed 5.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character uses a Skill:</color> If this character's HP is at least 6, deal 1 $[K5] to all opposing standby characters.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) Will not be <color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>;\nThis character gains +2 DMG when their HP does not exceed 5.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character uses a Skill:</color> If this character's HP is at least 6, deal 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing standby characters.
